If.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(Colors.MediumPurple, "[Profile Message!]: ", Colors.Yellow, "Please stand by as the functions are being activated!");

PickUp.QuestName: Too Many Irons in the Fire

TurnIn.QuestName: Too Many Irons in the Fire

Code.UseWhen: HasItem(112543) && Me.BagItems.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Entry == 112543).CooldownTimeLeft == TimeSpan.Zero && Unit(81428) == null && Unit(80335, u => u.Aggro) != null
